subject: Football
Concussions
lead_paragraph: The judge overseeing the proposed $765 million settlement in the N.F.L. concussion case appointed a special master to help analyze the final agreement, which could be filed in days.
snippet: The judge overseeing the proposed $765 million settlement in the N.F.L. concussion case appointed a special master to help analyze the final agreement, which could be filed in days.
